author: wsj
title: JPMORGAN Profit Sinks 70%; Braces For Loan Defaults...
description: Results in New York bank’s consumer unit fall sharply, while trading revenue rises
content: JPMorgan Profit Sinks Nearly 70% As It Braces For Loan Defaults JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s first-quarter profit tumbled 69% and the bank set aside a whopping $6.8 billion to cover potential losses on loans to consumers and businesses struggling to stay afloat dur… [+542 chars]
